item.title: 【BLU-RAY】BLU-RAY - Talking Heads - Stop Making Sense 1984 (2024) UHD Blu-Ray
item.description:
Talking Heads - Stop Making Sense 1984 (2024) UHD Blu-Ray



Screenshots:


Setlist:
01 - Psycho Killer
02 - Heaven
03 - Thank You For Sending Me An Angel
04 - Found A Job
05 - Slippery People
06 - Burning Down The House
07 - Life During Wartime
08 - Making Flippy Floppy
09 - Swamp
10 - What A Day That Was
11 - This Must Be The Place (Naive Melody)
12 - Once In A Lifetime
13 - Genius Of Love
14 - Girlfriend Is Better
15 - Take Me To The River
16 - Crosseyed And Painless Special Features
17 - Stop Making Sense: Talking Heads Extended Cut (2023)
18 - Jonathan Demme Extended Cut (1985)
Extras
19 - Does Anybody Have Any Questions: Making Stop Making Sense
20 - 26 Minutes Of David Byrne Dancing In Silence
Bonus Songs
21 - Cities: 2023 Talking Heads Edit
22 - Big Business / I Zimbra: 2023 Talking Heads Edit
23 - Cities: 1985 Jonathan Demme Edit
24 - Big Business / I Zimbra: 1985 Jonathan Demme Edit Commentary
25 - Jonathan Demme Director Commentary

Special Features:
Newly restored and remixed theatrical cut
2023 Dolby Atmos and 1984 Original Stereo mixes
Two extended cuts of the film: a brand new Talking Heads Extended Cut (2023) with previously unseen / newly restored footage from "Cities" and "Big Business / I Zimbra" and the original Jonathan Demme Extended Cut (1985) (1989 LaserDisc Transfer)
25-minute making-of documentary edited by Bill Ross IV
Jonathan Demme Director Commentary (Recorded in 1999, remixed in 2023 featuring previously unpublished archival audio)
David Byrne rehearsal tape (Archival VHS footage)
Bonus Songs "Cities" & "Big Business / I Zimbra" (2023 and 1985 edits)
English descriptive audio track
Optional English SDH and Spanish subtitles


Info:
Genre: Art Rock
Quality: UHD Blu-Ray | 2160p
Format: M2TS
Length: 01:39:44 + 01:28:13 + 02:45:16 | 86.9Gb
Video 1: H.265 | 3840x2160p | 67.9Mbps | 16:9 | 23.976fps
Video 2: H.265 | 1920x1080p | 5.6Mbps | 16:9 | 23.976fps
Video 3: H.264 | 1920x1080p | 12.0Mbps | 16:9 | 23.976fps
Audio 1: Dolby TrueHD Atmos | 5856kbps | 48kHz | 7.1 channels: L C R LFE Lb Rb Lss Rss
Audio 2: AC3 | 192kbps | 48kHz | 2 channels: L R
Audio 3: AC3 | 640kbps | 48kHz | 5.1 channels: Front: L C R, Surround: L R
